params.query: SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE Name = '{company_name}'
SELECT Id, Account.Name, Name, Email, Phone, MobilePhone, HomePhone FROM Contact WHERE Name = '{contact_name}'
SELECT Id, Name, ParentId FROM Account
SELECT Id, LeadSource, Name, Company, Rating FROM Lead WHERE Name='{lead_name}'
SELECT Id FROM Product2 WHERE Family='{product_family_name}'
SELECT Id, Description, Family FROM Product2 WHERE Name='{product_1_name}'
SELECT Id, Description, Family FROM Product2 WHERE Name='{product_2_name}'
SELECT Id, Description, Family FROM Product2 WHERE Name='{product_3_name}'
SELECT Id, Description, Family FROM Product2 WHERE Name='{product_4_name}'
SELECT Id FROM Territory2Model WHERE Name='{territory_model_name}'
SELECT Id, DeveloperName FROM ObjectTerritory2AssignmentRule WHERE MasterLabel='{rule_name}' AND Territory2ModelId='{retrieved_results['territory_model_info'].records[0]['Id']}'
SELECT Field, Operation, Value FROM ObjectTerritory2AssignmentRuleItem WHERE RuleId='{retrieved_results['territory_rule_info'].records[0]['Id']}'
SELECT Id, IsConverted, ConvertedAccountId, ConvertedOpportunityId FROM Lead WHERE Name='{lead_name}'
SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE Id='{retrieved_results['lead_info'].records[0]['ConvertedAccountId']}'
SELECT Id, Name FROM Opportunity WHERE Id='{retrieved_results['lead_info'].records[0]['ConvertedOpportunityId']}'
SELECT Id, StageName FROM Opportunity WHERE Name='{opportunity_name}'
SELECT Id, Description, Subject, TaskSubtype FROM Task WHERE WhatId='{retrieved_results['opportunity_info'].records[0]['Id']}'
SELECT Id, Description, Subject, EventSubtype FROM Event WHERE WhatId='{retrieved_results['opportunity_info'].records[0]['Id']}'
SELECT Name FROM Pricebook2 WHERE Name IN ('{price_book_name1}', '{price_book_name2}')
SELECT Product2.Name, Pricebook2.Name, UnitPrice FROM PricebookEntry WHERE Pricebook2.Name IN ('{price_book_name1}', '{price_book_name2}')
SELECT Id, ExpirationDate, Opportunity.Name FROM Quote WHERE Name='{quote_name}'
SELECT Discount, Product2.Name, Quantity FROM QuoteLineItem WHERE Quote.Name='{quote_name}'
SELECT Id, StartDate, ContractTerm  FROM Contract WHERE Account.Name='{account_name}'
SELECT Id, EffectiveDate FROM Order WHERE ContractId='{retrieved_results['contract_creation'].records[0]['Id']}'
SELECT Id, Type, StartDate, BudgetedCost, ExpectedRevenue FROM Campaign WHERE Name='{campaign_name}'
SELECT Lead.Name FROM CampaignMember WHERE Campaign.Name='{campaign_name}'
